bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edson J. Harkness was a Chicago lawyer and an officer in the U. S. Colored Troops, 6th regiment during the American Civil War.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes family correspondence (1827-1846), letters (1862-1864) written by Harkness while serving in the Civil War, commissions and court martial documents, and muster rolls (1863-1865).
